Last week the FED softened its stance towards raising interest rates, as they see the global economy slowing down & inflation contained... Couple this with the preliminary agreement between US & China on trade policies, the markets should be going up big tomorrow $ SPX $ DJI

US & China won't impose additional tariffs after January 1, US will remain at 10% as both continue talks in coming months... China will also increase its US imports, which will be great for US exporters. Markets are going to like this news... $ SPX $ DJI
